website_summaries.verdict: The Ecco Soft 8 High Top is a comfortable shoe with a hip look that goes with various smart casual outfits. Although this footwear is available at a premium rate, buyers still perceived it to be a bang for the buck because not only it is stylish and comfortable but also durable.
pros: The Ecco Soft 8 High Top has a sleek silhouette that it even looks perfect for those people with wider feet, a couple of users have mentioned
A handful of customers love the shoe’s soft leather upper because it feels comfortable
Some purchasers have used the words “amazing,” “perfect,” “great-looking,” “gorgeous” and “stylish” to describe the shoe
This pair of Ecco sneakers has reliable arch support, noted by a few testers
They can wear it with a dress-up or down outfit
A good number of people have attested that it is a well-built shoe
It is easier to put on and lace it up compared with the other Ecco soft shoes, as per a reviewer
Compared with the Ecco Soft 7 High Top, the leather of the Ecco Soft 8 High Top is more resistant, as related by a buyer
A satisfied wearer says that the footwear is very light and it feels good on the feet
cons: A couple of users have noted that the Ecco Soft 8 High Top squeaks on the floor during the first few wears
Some testers have reported that it fits a bit wide

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe arrived within the given time-frame, which is always nice. It appears to be well built, has with all the Eccos, and it is comfortable. I've owned multiple Ecco shoes, but this is my first athletic type, and although it is listed as a sneaker, I can't see playing playing basketball in it because it does not have the cushy sole support like a Nike. This is more for causal wearing; however, that is up to the wearer. Overall, I like and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Groovemaker2

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: One of the better pairs of Ecco High Tops I've owned. Squishy comfy. Squeaks on floors at first but that wears out. I feel like these run about a half size (maybe a bit more) big but most Ecco buyers know that is the case, especially with the men's sneaks. The leather is more resistant than the comfort 7 and this doesn't have the ankle notch of the 7, which I prefer. Easier to lace and put on than the 7. Slightly stiffer leather but still ridiculously comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new favourite shoes
customer_reviews.text: After much searching and consideration, I chose these Ecco soft 8 high tops. After a couple weeks of active, daily use walking and cycling (on and off the job), I am deeply pleased with the versatile style, build quality and comfort. I have since recommended this brand and exact model to others. One caution in choosing this shoe is that they are sized unusually large, at least in translation to US sizing (where I range from men's 7 to 8), in the Ecco the EU size 39 I have is translated inside the shoe to a US 5.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel H Geiger

customer_reviews.title: beautiful sneaker that fits well
customer_reviews.text: This pair of sneaker is soft, with color of blue. The leather is of good quality. It is made with fine technique, as other Ecco shoes. The arch is flat, and so is the sole, so the support is not very strong.
customer_reviews.author: wangjing

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and comfy sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers fit perfectly right out of the box. They are very comfy and don't require any break-in period just like all Ecco's I had (about a dozen). They also look sharp in this color combination and I already got some compliments on them. The only minor drawback is the sole - it's not for slippery surfaces so don't even try wearing these on black ice ))
customer_reviews.author: Surrge

customer_reviews.title: My travel shoe...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear on a 10 day trip to Italy. A few of the days there I clocked 7-9 miles in them (and once a 12 mi day) They are very comfortable and very stylish-very similar to a NIKE shoe I wear.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes; Great color
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of the Soft 8 line. They fit me well and feel comfortable all day long. In addition, the high tops seem to provide some ankle support. And several shoe colors are truly eye-catching, particularly the indigo black.
customer_reviews.author: Golfpoet

customer_reviews.title: I spent $189 on a pair of shoes I thought would last and be comfortable. Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are delaminating at the soles. Both left and right shoes. Shoe laces lasted a few weeks. I spent $189 on a pair of shoes I thought would last and be comfortable. Not worth the price, very disappointed in the product. Purchase in September, falling apart by December.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard P.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes but they run a little large. Get a size or 1/2 size down from what you usually order
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes, nice materials and very tasteful minimalist construction. No visible stitching which gives them a very unusual and tasteful look. High quality leather. Love them. What all the reviewer say about them running large is true. I always take a size 12 so I ordered the 11/11 1/2 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: 30 Weight

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. One problem, I’ve ordered other colors in these exact same boots and they all came with another set of laces. These did not! Most likely whomever previously ordered and returned them decided to keep the second pair of laces. It’s not a dealbreaker for me, but it might be for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Ron G

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. It fits very well and I got a lot of compliments wearing it. It is very comfortable and snuggly fits around your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Edem

customer_reviews.title: Well built and stylish
customer_reviews.text: excellent shoe. I have back issues and ECCO was recommended by my PT. These are stylish and very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus Surrealius

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, a bit loose
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes, feels great. It is not a perfect fit but it is not bad enough that I can't wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe quality
customer_reviews.text: Solid shoe perfect fit and great quality, the leather is soft and they look amazing with jeans my husband loves it
customer_reviews.author: Seleny torres

customer_reviews.title: supple leather, total comfort
customer_reviews.text: high quality craftsmanship, ran slightly large. exchanged for 1 size smaller. supple leather, well- constructed. comfortable, supportive footbed. great customer service turn with quick turn around time on exchange during the busy post holiday rush!
customer_reviews.author: nouveaugirl

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love Ecco shoes to begin with and these did not disappoint! Great fit, comfy, good quality, and cool!
customer_reviews.author: AKE

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - Vendor outside US - Shoes not true sizing
customer_reviews.text: I order a pair of ECCO high tops for my boyfriend and they are clearly NOT true to size. Ordered 8/8.5 and they were way too big. Ecco shoes bought in US run true to size. I would not order from this vendor again PLUS return shipping was $60.00 US, outrageous.
customer_reviews.author: K. Van Fossan

customer_reviews.title: Sized too large
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 8 and the size 40 is what fit me.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes but the smaller sizes run a half size larger so buy a half size lower than normal. Most comfortable shoes I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: William Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Run Big!!
customer_reviews.text: They run big so if you where a 10 get sz 8
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Comfort with Style
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable, and the look like a Rockstar shoe.
customer_reviews.author: charles williams

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes you will buy
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes you will buy, this is my 3rd pair one low top the other two high tops plus they are great looking .
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom in Miami

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, look amazing, very stylish, i recommend these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Jamey Meetze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these sneakers. I am very pleased and satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Thomas JR. Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Game Needed New SWAG
customer_reviews.text: Awesome View and Look with ole Schoole soft toe appeal that’s goes with casual Daily Swag,
customer_reviews.author: James Young

customer_reviews.title: buy your correct size and you would have bought the best there is
customer_reviews.text: Apart from the unique design, there are not enough adjectives to describe the comfort of these shoes. The important thing is...buy your correct size and you would have bought the best there is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy Looking Sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, comfortable & classy sneaker. Also, I have not seen anyone in Chicago with a bluish black colored sneaker like this, so they stand out in a crowd.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE THE SHOE AND IT FEELS WELL MADE
customer_reviews.text: fit is exact and there is not extra room on this shoe.... weight is very light and it is not heavy duty but does look and feel good on the feet great when worn with a Philadelphia Eagles superbowl champs shirt and hat. Overall,a high quality shoe made very well by chinese using lightweight materials
customer_reviews.author: John Ward

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I wear them every day and they always look brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Ward

customer_reviews.title: Are you kidding me?
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me? I hooked up with these kicks and I been in the game since. I've got ladies up in the stable busting my phone If you're game is weak I'm spouting for you to wire up with these and watch yourself fly.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Brigance

customer_reviews.title: Light as feather and very soft and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Super soft leather and real light shoe. Well built I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: JθηSριrιτhoη

customer_reviews.title: Great Style!
customer_reviews.text: Great, new style look combined with Ecco comfort and fit. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to wear them out 😜
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of the shoe and the fit is even better, very sleek and different than any other she I’ve own, awesome product 👍🏿
customer_reviews.author: Brent Greenidge

customer_reviews.title: Worn or scuffed
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of shoes I ordered. This pair also has scratches on the back of the shoe !
customer_reviews.author: Only shop with Prime

customer_reviews.title: THE RUN A LITTLE SMALL,SO GO UP IN SIZE
customer_reviews.text: INCREDIBLE FIT AND I WEAR A 11.5,THE 12 IS PERFECT FOR MY FEET SINCE THE SHOE RUNS A LITTLE SMALL.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Baker

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Use it a few times and the sole has taken off, this product sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Nenias Wuo

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and great quality made in china
customer_reviews.text: GREAT CHINA quality. Feel light look great hope material holds up. will report back with further info as it developes
customer_reviews.author: John Ward

customer_reviews.title: A little bit large.
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit large but I like the extra room for my toes that it won't hurt at the end of the day wearing it for 10 hours at work. Will recommend a size smaller if you want the exact fit. Good product with good price.
customer_reviews.author: vince2303

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Quality
customer_reviews.text: Both of the white heels had black paint oversprayed on them.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Boehner

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's Soft 8 High Top Ii Hi Trainers
product_meta.description: On-trend simple Scandinavian sneaker range on a buffed up cupsole - contemporary styling in exquisite materials
feature_bullets: Special SHINEBRIGHT leather merges nature and technology together, creating a reflective, water repellent leather.
Full-leather lining for a rich, elegant look and feel ensures a perfect inner climate
ECCO Comfort Fiber system (ECFS ) helps to keep feet fresh and dry
Direct injected two component PU/TPU outsole- Light and flexible with a unique youthful design trending on a heavier cupsole look
